name: Accurate
description: For each rank of this trait, the attacker adds :boost: to their attack dice pools while using this weapon.

name: Auto-Fire
description: Increase the difficulty of the attack by one. If the attack hits the attacker can trigger Auto-Fire with :advantage::advantage:. Auto-Fire can be triggered multiple times. Each time the attacker triggers Auto-Fire it deals an additional hit to the target.

name: Blast
description:
If the attack is successful and Blast activates, each character (friend or foe) Engaged with the original target suffers wounds equal to the weapon’s Blast rating.

If the attack misses Blast can still be activated with :advantage::advantage::advantage: causing damage to the target and all Engaged targets equal to the Blast rating of the weapon.

name: Breach
description: Ignore one point of Armor or 10 points of Soak for every rank of Breach.

name: Burn
description: If the attack is successful, the target continues to take the weapon’s base damage for a number of rounds equal to the weapon’s Burn rating.

name: Concussive
description: The target is staggered for a number of rounds equal to the weapon’s Concussive rating. A staggered target cannot perform actions.

name: Cortosis
description:
Weapons with the Cortosis quality are immune to the Sunder quality.

Armour with the Cortosis quality ignores the Pierce and Breach qualities.

name: Cumbersome
description: The character needs a Brawn characteristic equal to or greater than the weapon’s Cumbersome rating. For each point of Brawn by which the character is deficient, increase the difficulty of all checks while using the weapon by 1.

name: Defensive
description: Increase melee defence by the weapon’s Defensive rating.

name: Deflection
description: Increase ranged defence by the weapon’s Deflection rating.

name: Disorient
description: The target is disoriented for a number of rounds equal to the weapon’s Disorient rating. A disorientated target adds :setback: to all skill checks.

name: Ensnare
description: The target is immobilized for a number of rounds equal to the weapon’s Ensnare rating. An ensnared target may attempt a :hard: Athletics check to attempt to break free.

name: Guided
description: If the attack misses the weapon can make an attack check at the end of the round using the weapon’s Guided rating as ability dice. Requires :advantage::advantage::advantage: to activate.

name: Inaccurate
description: Add :setback: to the attacker’s dice pool equal to their Inaccurate rating.

name: Inferior
description: Generates automatic :threat: on all checks.

name: Ion
description: Damage is dealt as System Strain (Vehicles) or Strain (Droids).

name: Knockdown
description: The target is knocked prone. Knockdown requires :advantage::advantage: to trigger plus one per point of Silhouette of the target beyond 1.

name: Limited Ammo
description: May be used to make a number of attacks equal to its Limited Ammo rating before it must be reloaded.

name: Linked
description: On a successful attack the wielder may activate to gain an additional hit and may do so a number of times equal to the weapon’s Linked rating.

name: Modular
description: Add :setback: to Perception checks to detect when disassembled.

name: Pierce
description: Ignores one point of Soak for each rank of Pierce.

name: Prepare
description: The user must perform a number of Prepare maneuvers equal to the weapon’s Prepare rating before making attacks.

name: Slow-Firing
description: Weapon must wait a number of rounds equal to its Slow-Firing rating before firing again.

name: Stun
description: Weapon causes Strain to the target.

name: Stun Damage
description: Weapon deals damage as Strain instead of wounds.

name: Stun Setting
description: Can switch weapon to Stun Damage which causes Strain to the target.

name: Sunder
description: Damages opposing weapon one step. Requires :advantage: to activate.

name: Superior
description: Generates automatic :advantage: on all checks and increases base damage by 1.

name: Tractor
description: Target may not move unless it makes a successful Piloting check with a difficulty based on the tractor beam’s rating.

name: Unwieldy
description: To wield correctly, character needs Agility characteristic equal or greater than rating.

name: Vicious
description: Add 10 times the Vicious rating to the critical roll.
